channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 台湾新当选总统将面临中国的愤怒
item.description: Taiwan's new president-elect, Lai Ching-te, is likely to face his toughest task yet when he takes office in May and has to deal with the ire of China which has repeatedly denounced him as a dangerous separatist.翻译:台湾新任总统当选人赖清德在五月份上任时可能会面临迄今为止最艰巨的任务，并且必须应对中国的愤怒，中国一再谴责他是危险的分裂分子。
item.author: Ben Blanchard

item.title: 中国煤矿事故已造成至少10人死亡 需安全检查
item.description: At least 10 people have died and six are missing after a coal mine accident in the city of Pingdingshan, in central China, the local emergency management agency said on Saturday, vowing to continue rescue operations and launch city-wide safety checks.翻译:平顶山市应急管理机构周六表示，中国中部地区平顶山市发生煤矿事故，目前已造成至少10人死亡、6人失踪，并表示将继续开展救援行动并开展全市安全检查。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾选举可能发生什么以及结果意味着什么
item.description: Polls closed on Saturday for Taiwan's presidential and parliamentary elections.翻译:台湾总统选举和立法院选举的投票于周六结束。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 西藏不是焦点，镇压持续存在：流亡前领导人
item.description: The plight of Tibet has become less discussed internationally but repression continues and China is applying what it did there to other regions, a former head of the Tibetan government-in-exile said on Saturday.翻译:西藏流亡政府前领导人周六表示，国际上对西藏困境的讨论越来越少，但镇压仍在继续，中国正在将其在其他地区的做法应用到其他地区。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 塔比洛为澳大利亚网球公开赛做好准备，奥克兰获胜
item.description: Alejandro Tabilo will head into the Australian Open on a high after winning his first ATP Tour title with a 6-2 7-5 victory over Japan's Taro Daniel in the Auckland Classic final on Saturday.翻译:亚历杭德罗·塔比洛 (Alejandro Tabilo) 在周六的奥克兰经典赛决赛中以 6-2 7-5 战胜日本选手丹尼尔·塔罗 (Taro Daniel)，赢得了他的首个 ATP 巡回赛冠军，将以高姿态进军澳大利亚公开赛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾又发现两颗中国热气球穿越海峡
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Saturday it had detected two Chinese balloons crossing the Taiwan Strait in the previous 24 hours, one of which flew over Taiwan island, the latest in a spate of balloon sightings the ministry has reported.翻译:台湾国防部周六表示，在过去 24 小时内检测到两枚中国气球穿越台湾海峡，其中一枚飞越台湾岛，这是台湾国防部报告的一系列气球目击事件中的最新一起。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 布林肯与中国官员讨论人权、台海问题
item.description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Friday raised concerns over China's human rights issues in a meeting with senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington, the State Department said, adding they also discussed "maintaining peace and stability" in the Taiwan Strait.翻译:美国国务院表示，美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯周五在华盛顿会见中国高级官员刘建超时表达了对中国人权问题的担忧，并补充说，他们还讨论了“维护台湾海峡的和平与稳定”。
item.author: Kanishka Singh

item.title: 台湾选民拒绝中国并给予执政党第三个总统任期
item.description: Lai Ching-te's party, which champions Taiwan's separate identity and rejects China's territorial claims, was seeking a third term. Beijing framed the elections as a choice between war and peace.翻译:赖清德领导的政党主张台湾的独立身份，拒绝中国的领土主张，正在寻求第三次连任。北京将这次选举视为战争与和平之间的选择。
item.author: Yimou Lee, James Pomfret

item.title: 中国敦促加强房地产业融资协调
item.description: China's housing ministry and financial regulator asked local governments to better coordinate with financial institutions to provide financing support to real estate projects, as policymakers work to revive the sluggish housing market.翻译:在政策制定者努力重振低迷的房地产市场之际，中国住房和城乡建设部和金融监管机构要求地方政府更好地与金融机构协调，为房地产项目提供融资支持。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国2023年银行贷款创历史新高，但经济仍举步维艰
item.description: New bank lending in China rose less than expected in December, but 2023 lending hit a new record as the central bank kept policy accommodative to support an unexpectedly shaky economic recovery.翻译:12 月份中国新增银行贷款增幅低于预期，但由于央行保持宽松政策以支持意外不稳定的经济复苏，2023 年贷款创下新纪录。
item.author: Judy Hua, Kevin Yao

item.title: 在与中国的月球竞赛中，美国的挫折考验私营企业的作用
item.description: Two U.S. setbacks this week in the race to the moon with China illustrate the risks of NASA's plans to bet on a new strategy of relying heavily on private companies.翻译:本周美国在与中国的登月竞赛中遭遇的两次挫折说明了美国宇航局计划押注于严重依赖私营公司的新战略的风险。
item.author: Joey Roulette, Nivedita Bhattacharjee, Ryan Woo

item.title: 需求疲软，贷款收紧：香港房地产开发商面临艰难的2024年
item.description: Hong Kong's property companies face a squeeze in 2024 from rising funding costs and sluggish home sales and office rentals, making creditors and investors cautious about developers’ financial health.翻译:由于融资成本上升以及房屋销售和写字楼租金低迷，香港房地产公司将在 2024 年面临压力，这使得债权人和投资者对开发商的财务状况持谨慎态度。
item.author: Clare Jim

item.title: 中国媒体警告不要将中国印度洋研究视为威胁
item.description: Chinese state media warned on Friday that a report by a prominent U.S. think tank on the military uses of Chinese scientific research across the Indian Ocean gave "ammunition" to countries bent on concocting threats from China.翻译:中国官方媒体周五警告说，美国一家著名智库发布的一份关于中国科研成果在印度洋的军事用途的报告，为那些一心炮制中国威胁的国家提供了“弹药”。
item.author: Greg Torode

item.title: 2023年中俄贸易额创历史新高2400亿美元——中国海关
item.description: China's 2023 two-way trade with Russia hit $240 billion, setting yet another new record, Chinese customs data showed on Friday, as the two countries pushed for closer economic ties even as the war in Ukraine raged on.翻译:中国海关周五公布的数据显示，2023年中国与俄罗斯的双向贸易额达到2400亿美元，再创新高，尽管乌克兰战争仍在继续，但两国仍在推动更紧密的经济联系。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾民众举行选举集会，中国誓言“粉碎独立阴谋”
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of people attended final pre-election rallies in Taiwan on Friday ahead of critical presidential and parliamentary polls, as China's defence ministry warned it would "smash any Taiwan independence plots".翻译:周五，在关键的总统和议会选举之前，数十万人参加了台湾的最后一次选举前集会，中国国防部警告称，将“粉碎任何台独阴谋”。
item.author: James Pomfret, Sarah Wu

item.title: 中国出口增长但通货紧缩持续 经济迈入2024年基础不稳
item.description: More policy support seen as economy still fragile.翻译:经济仍脆弱，政策支持力度加大。
item.author: Joe Cash, Ellen Zhang, Liangping Gao

item.title: 布林肯将在台湾选举前会见中国高级官员
item.description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will meet senior Chinese official Liu Jianchao in Washington on Friday, the State Department said in his official schedule, the talks coming just a day ahead of elections in Taiwan that will test efforts to ease U.S.-China tensions.翻译:美国国务院在其官方日程中表示，美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯将于周五在华盛顿会见中国高级官员刘建超，此次会谈将在台湾选举前一天进行，此次选举将考验缓解美中紧张局势的努力。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 台湾称投票前一天在海峡上空发现更多中国气球
item.description: Taiwan's defence ministry said on Friday it detected five Chinese balloons flying over the Taiwan Strait over the past 24 hours, one of which crossed the island, the latest in a spate of such balloons the ministry says it has spotted over the past month.翻译:台湾国防部周五表示，在过去 24 小时内发现了 5 个中国气球飞越台湾海峡，其中一个飞越了台湾岛，这是该部门在过去一个月发现的一系列此类气球中的最新一个。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 部长们表示，中国和加拿大将就“困难”关系保持接触
item.description: China and Canada want to maintain contacts to bolster what Beijing called the "current difficult situation" in bilateral relations, the two governments said after talks between their foreign ministers.翻译:两国外长会谈后两国政府表示，中国和加拿大希望保持接触，以加强北京所称的双边关系“当前困难局面”。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国就芯片制造出口管制和制裁向美国提出担忧
item.description: China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao expressed concern over U.S. curbs preventing third countries from exporting lithography machines to China during a phone call with U.S. Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo on Thursday, his ministry said.翻译:中国商务部表示，中国商务部部长王文涛周四在与美国商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多的电话中对美国阻止第三国向中国出口光刻机的限制措施表示担忧。
item.author: Joe Cash
